page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: There is a wide{variety}of housing types in the area both in terms of age,quality,appearance and price. The following list is compiled from the Somerset County Gazette,July 1985,and indicates the sort of{asking {prices}for housesin and around Trull: TRULL:Imposing{detached village {property}comprising 5 bedrooms,lounge with stone bar and stone fireplace with gas flame fire.Dining room,kitchen,cloakroom,sun lounge with patio.Study and basement comprising bar lounge and billiards room,2 bathrooms and seperate shower room.Full gas central heating.Long drive leading to double garage with remote controlled doors.Gardens front and rear.Freehold to include all carpets,curtains and matching lounge furniture together with full-sized billiards table.Offers over Â£150,000
